title: Programming Concepts
description: Introduces fundamental programming concepts using a high-level programming language.

title: English Language I
description: Focuses on developing academic reading and writing skills in English.

title: History of Qatar
description: Explores the historical development of Qatar from past to present.

title: General Chemistry I
description: Covers basic principles of chemistry including atomic structure and chemical reactions.

title: Experimental General Chemistry I
description: Introduces laboratory techniques and experiments in general chemistry.

title: Calculus I
description: Covers limits, derivatives, and applications of differential calculus.

title: Object Oriented Programming
description: Teaches object-oriented programming concepts such as classes, inheritance, and polymorphism.

title: English Language II
description: Continues academic English instruction with a focus on advanced writing and research skills.

title: General Physics for Engineering I
description: Introduces classical mechanics concepts relevant to engineering.

title: Experimental General Physics for Engineering I
description: Provides practical laboratory experience in basic physics experiments.

title: Calculus II
description: Extends calculus to integration, techniques of integration, and applications.

title: Arabic Language I
description: Develops basic skills in Arabic language communication and comprehension.

title: Data Structures
description: Covers fundamental data structures like arrays, stacks, queues, linked lists, and trees.

title: Discrete Structures
description: Introduces logic, sets, relations, functions, and other discrete math topics used in computer science.

title: Computer Ethics
description: Examines ethical issues and responsibilities in the computing profession.

title: General Physics for Engineering II
description: Focuses on electricity, magnetism, and other advanced topics in physics.

title: Experimental General Physics for Engineering II
description: Provides hands-on lab experiments in electromagnetism and related topics.

title: Linear Algebra
description: Introduces matrices, vectors, linear transformations, and systems of linear equations.

title: Design & Analysis of Algorithms
description: Studies algorithm design techniques and analyzes algorithm efficiency.

title: Fundamentals of Database
description: Covers database concepts including modeling, SQL, and relational databases.

title: Computer Architecture I
description: Explains computer hardware structure and the organization of digital systems.

title: Arabic Language II
description: Builds on Arabic I with more advanced grammar, vocabulary, and writing.

title: Probability & Statistics
description: Covers basic probability theory, distributions, and statistical analysis.

title: Software Engineering
description: Introduces software development processes, design principles, and project management.

title: Networks I
description: Covers principles of data communication, networking models, and protocols.

title: Numerical Methods
description: Applies numerical techniques to solve mathematical and engineering problems.

title: Operating Systems
description: Studies operating system concepts including processes, memory management, and file systems.

title: Fundamentals of Cybersecurity
description: Explores principles of information security, threats, and protection techniques.

title: Web Development Fundamentals
description: Covers basic front-end and back-end web development technologies.

title: Islamic Culture
description: Introduces students to Islamic beliefs, culture, and history.

title: Intro to Project Management and Entrepreneurship
description: Covers fundamentals of project planning, team management, and entrepreneurial thinking.

title: Principles of Management
description: Introduces basic management functions, leadership, and organizational structure.
